features.title: Features
features.heading: Built to evolve with every mile.
features.subheading: Seven hero modules showcase how the system adapts to every build.

1.title: Bolt-Together Core
1.description: Anodized aluminum extrusions connect with serviceable hardware so repairs and upgrades happen without downtime.

2.title: Integrated Lighting
2.description: Flush-mounted scene lights and DOT signals tuck into protected channels with plug-and-play harnessing.

3.title: Modular Gear Rails
3.description: Full-perimeter accessory rail accepts MOLLE plates, RTT mounts, and cargo solutions without drilling.

4.title: Tie-Down Ecosystem
4.description: Adjustable cleats and recessed l-track anchor everything from camp kitchens to worksite payloads.

5.title: Powder-Coated Armor
5.description: Textured powder coat shrugs off trail rash while sealed seams keep corrosion at bay.

6.title: Service-Ready Wiring
6.description: Loomed conduits and labeled pass-throughs make electrical upgrades and diagnostics straightforward.

7.title: Adventure-Proof Storage
7.description: Lockable side boxes and underdeck drawers keep recovery gear organized and dust free.

form.post_success: Thanks for reaching out. We'll respond shortly.
